name: Firefox App button - Styled like window controls
description: Makes the Firefox App Button blend into the titlebar and makes the titlebar more symmetrical, by making it look like the window controls (minimize, maximize/restore, exit buttons).

user.name: banthaz
user.about: I only test my styles using the latest stable Firefox version on Windows 7 with Aero theme. About the license CC BY 3.0: If you're on userstyles.org: Just mention my username ;) If you're somewhere else: Add a link to this page too
